messages.subject: Re: A couple quick things re: snarking and controlling threads
messages.msgSnippet: ~~Hi all. I want to post real quick to clarify that I am not the one who said anything snarky about this list. ~~ Just to clarify, the person wasn t anyone who
messages.messageBody:
~~Hi all. I want to post real quick to clarify that I am not the one
who said anything snarky
about this list. ~~

Just to clarify, the person wasn't anyone who has posted in several
weeks as far as I know. She had threatened to leave the list a long
time ago, but apparently decided to hang out just to find fodder for
badmouthing the list. I guess that was more entertaining than a
discussion.:)

I've really enjoyed all the "porn" dialogue...haha.

Off to Asheville now, I want to catch up tomorrow. Having lotsa
thoughts about various posts. Have a great night everyone!

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: A couple quick things re: snarking and controlling threads
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all.  I want to post real quick to clarify that I am not the one who said anything snarky about this list.  I don t know if anybody thought that, but since
messages.messageBody:
Hi all. I want to post real quick to clarify that I am not the one
who said anything snarky
about this list. I don't know if anybody thought that, but since I
was the one who started a
thread that lead to some discussion of porn and kids running in the
street, I just want to
make sure no one thinks that poster on another list is me.

Secondly, thank you to everyone who continued dialoguing with me on
my topic. I really am
getting a lot from everyone, and do wish to continue the dialogue. I
spent almost four hours
that one night replying to everyone, and I just can't take the time
to do that again just yet. I
hope you'll still be open to continuing when I can get to it.

Maura
